TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Piyuma, title = Piyuma, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piyuma} }

S.FORM: alang Piyuma ga niya mki sku Heto Keng atu Taybu go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 168 buwan, 716 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 98% kyan ku 702 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 2% kyan ku 14 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Paywan 93%, Amis 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 3%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Piyuma hya' ga Qapedang. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Piyoma ga niya mki sko Heto Keng ato Taybo go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 168 bowan, 716 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 98% kyan ko 702 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 2% kyan ko 14 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Paywan 93%, Amis 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 3%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Piyoma hya' ga Qapedang. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
